revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NXP |model=MCIMX8M |revision=-EVK |price=449 |fcc_date=03/04/2018 |is_manuf=No |fcc_id=XXMMCIMX8M-EVK |type=development board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=i.MX8MQ;MIMX8MQ, 6DVAJZAA, i.MX8M Quad; |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz <!-- + 266 MHz --> |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC16GAKAECN-2M WT |fla2=32 |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MT25QL256ABA1EW9-0SIT |ram1=3 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT53B768M32D4NQ-062 WT:B |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, J401,, |serial=yes,, |wi1_module=Murata Type 1CQ (KM6N16055) |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Cypress |wi1_chip1_model=CYW43596 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8031;AR8031-AL1A; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=24-bit 192kHz Stereo DAC;Wolfson;WM8524;WM8524G, 68AMGHT;1; ,,, 14-channel PMIC;NXP;PF4210;NXP, PC32PF42, 10A0ES, XADGTA;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.1, Audio out (3.5mm), HDMI 2.0a |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Evaluation Kit for the i.MX 8M Applications Processor}} :[https://www.nxp.com/support/developer-resources/run-time-software/i.mx-developer-resources/evaluation-kit-for-the-i.mx-8m-applications-processor:MCIMX8M-EVK Support page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.mouser.com/ds/2/302/IMX8MDQLQEVKHUG-1280333.pdf Datasheet]
"SCH-29615 REV B2" is silkscreened on the [https://www.nxp.com/assets/images/en/dev-board-image/MCIMX8M-EVK-TOP.jpg board] in the FCC photos.
The product page claims ''4GB LPDDR4'' but the FCC internal photos :show a [https://www.micron.com/parts/dram/mobile-ddr4-sdram/mt53b768m32d4nq-062-wt Micron MT53B768M32D4NQ-062 WT:B] which is 3GB :according to the [https://www.micron.com/~/media/documents/products/other-documents/nxp_compatibility_chart.pdf ''NXP Compatibility Chart'' from '''Micron'''].
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/01/11/develop-nxp-i-mx-8m-voice-controlled-smart-devices-with-mcimx8m-evk-evaluation-kit/ ''NXP MCIMX8M-EVK'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ([https://www.cnx-software.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/NXP-i.MX-8M-Evaluation-Kit-Block-Diagram.png Block Diagram])
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX8MQ (MIMX8MQ) ([https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/applications-processors/i.mx-applications-processors/i.mx-8-processors/i.mx-8m-family-armcortex-a53-cortex-m4-audio-voice-video:i.MX8M i.MX8M] Quad) :4x ARM Cortex-A53 (1.5GHz) :1x ARM Cortex-M4 (266MHz) :GPU: ''Vivante'' GC7000L *Flash: 16GB (eMMC 5.0), 32MB (Quad SPI NOR) *RAM: 3GB (LPDDR4 SDRAM 3200MHz) *Ports: 1x GbE (10/100/1000) Ethernet :2x USB 3.0 (Type A & Type C) *WiFi: 802.11abgn/ac MIMO 2x2 ([https://wireless.murata.com/eng/products/rf-modules-1/wi-fi-bluetooth-for-nxp-i-mx.html Murata Type 1CQ]) *Bluetooth: BT 4.1/EDR (KM6N16055 module) *Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2 Key E), microSD Card slot *Video: MIPI-CSI Camera mini-SAS :HDMI 2.0a, MIPI-DSI Display mini-SAS *Audio: AudioCODEC (3.5mm jack) :32bit audio samples with 768KHz *Power: 12V/5A Power Supply Unit :PMIC: NXP PF4210 (PMIC, DCDC/LDO)
__NOTOC__
